<script>
document.getElementById('contact-form').addEventListener('submit', function(e) {
    e.preventDefault();
    
    const formStatus = document.getElementById('form-status');
    const submitBtn = e.target.querySelector('button[type="submit"]');
    
    // Show loading state
    submitBtn.textContent = 'Sending...';
    submitBtn.disabled = true;
    
    // Simulate form submission (replace with actual form handling)
    setTimeout(() => {
        // Reset button
        submitBtn.textContent = 'Send Message';
        submitBtn.disabled = false;
        
        // Show success message
        formStatus.className = 'form-status success';
        formStatus.style.display = 'block';
        formStatus.innerHTML = `
            <strong>Message sent successfully!</strong><br>
            Thank you for contacting us. We'll get back to you within 24 hours.
        `;
        
        // Reset form
        e.target.reset();
        
        // Hide status after 5 seconds
        setTimeout(() => {
            formStatus.style.display = 'none';
        }, 5000);
        
    }, 1500);
});
</script>

## Frequently Asked Questions

::: {.faq-section}

**Q: What types of projects do you typically work on?**  
A: We specialize in data analytics, dashboard development, business intelligence solutions, and strategic consulting. Our projects range from small data visualization tasks to enterprise-wide analytics platforms.

**Q: How long does a typical project take?**  
A: Project timelines vary based on scope and complexity. Simple dashboards might take 2-4 weeks, while comprehensive analytics platforms can take 3-6 months. We'll provide a detailed timeline during our initial consultation.

**Q: Do you work with small businesses?**  
A: Absolutely! We work with organizations of all sizes, from startups to Fortune 500 companies. We tailor our approach to fit your budget and requirements.

**Q: Can you work with our existing data infrastructure?**  
A: Yes, we're experienced with a wide variety of databases, cloud platforms, and data formats. We'll assess your current setup and recommend the best integration approach.

**Q: Do you provide ongoing support after project completion?**  
A: Yes, we offer various support and maintenance packages to ensure your solutions continue to perform optimally as your business grows.

:::
